languages.text: {n}Стражникам не хватает смелости с вами спорить: они неохотно расступаются. Когда девушка оборачивается, вы видите на простодушном лице мокрые дорожки.{/n} "Спасибо, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, миленьк{mf|ий|ая}. Вовек не забуду!" {n}Женщина низко кланяется и исчезает в темном проеме.{/n}

{n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стражникам не хватает смелости с вами спорить: они неохотно расступаются. Когда девушка оборачивается, вы видите на простодушном лице мокрые дорожки.{/n} "Спасибо, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, миленьк{mf|ий|ая}. Вовек не забуду!" {n}Женщина низко кланяется и исчезает в темном проеме.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her candid and unsophisticated face.{/n} "Thank you, my celestial {mf|lord|lady}, my dearest! I'll never forget your kindness! I'll sew a bed sheet in your honour — no, a whole mountain of bed sheets!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

I'll sew a bed sheet in your honour — no, a whole mountain of bed sheets!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

{n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, celestial {mf|lord|lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness! I'll sew a bedsheet in your honour — no, a whole mountain of bedsheets!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

I'll sew a bedsheet in your honour — no, a whole mountain of bedsheets!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

{n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}守卫不敢违逆你的要求，只得勉强让开了身子。当这个女人回头看着你时，你注意到了她脸上的泪痕。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人！您真是最可爱的人！我永远不会忘记您的仁慈！”{n}随后，她低下了头，消失在了黑暗之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}守卫不敢违逆你的要求，只得勉强让开了身子。当这个女人回头看着你时，你注意到了她脸上的泪痕。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人！您真是最可爱的人！我永远不会忘记您的仁慈！”{n}随后，她低下了头，消失在了黑暗之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}衛兵たちはあなたの命令に逆らう勇気もなく、しぶしぶ道を開けた。女性が振り返ってこちらを見たとき、その無垢な顔に涙の跡が残っているのが見えた。{/n}「ありがとう、天の{mf|君|姫}！あんたは本当に優しいね！このご恩は一生忘れないよ！」{n}彼女は深々と頭を下げ、闇の中へと姿を消した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}衛兵たちはあなたの命令に逆らう勇気もなく、しぶしぶ道を開けた。女性が振り返ってこちらを見たとき、その無垢な顔に涙の跡が残っているのが見えた。{/n}「ありがとう、天の{mf|君|姫}！あんたは本当に優しいね！このご恩は一生忘れないよ！」{n}彼女は深々と頭を下げ、闇の中へと姿を消した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Carentes de valor para oponerse a tu exigencia, los guardias se hacen a un lado a regañadientes. Cuando la mujer se vuelve hacia ti, ves que tiene el rostro surcado de lágrimas.{/n} «¡Gracias, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Es usted {mf|un santo|una santa}! ¡Jamás olvidaré su bondad!». {n}Hace una profunda reverencia y luego desaparece en la oscuridad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Carentes de valor para oponerse a tu exigencia, los guardias se hacen a un lado a regañadientes. Cuando la mujer se vuelve hacia ti, ves que tiene el rostro surcado de lágrimas.{/n} «¡Gracias, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Es usted {mf|un santo|una santa}! ¡Jamás olvidaré su bondad!». {n}Hace una profunda reverencia y luego desaparece en la oscuridad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Emrine karşı çıkamayan muhafızlar, isteksizce geri çekiliyor. Gözlerinden yaşlar boşalan kadın, arkasını dönüp samimiyetle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Sağ olun {mf|beyim|hanımım}! Pek altın kalpliymişsiniz! Bu iyiliğinizi asla unutmayacağım!" {n}Kadın, ayaklarına kapandıktan sonra karanlığa karışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emrine karşı çıkamayan muhafızlar, isteksizce geri çekiliyor. Gözlerinden yaşlar boşalan kadın, arkasını dönüp samimiyetle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Sağ olun {mf|beyim|hanımım}! Pek altın kalpliymişsiniz! Bu iyiliğinizi asla unutmayacağım!" {n}Kadın, ayaklarına kapandıktan sonra karanlığa karışıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}N'osant s'opposer à vous, les gardes s'écartent à contrecœur. Lorsque la femme se tourne pour vous jeter un regard, vous remarquez des marques de larmes sur son visage candide.{/n} « Merci, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! {mf|Loué|Louée} soyez-vous ! Je n'oublierai jamais votre bonté ! » {n}dit-elle en s'inclinant profondément avant de disparaître dans les ténèbres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}N'osant s'opposer à vous, les gardes s'écartent à contrecœur. Lorsque la femme se tourne pour vous jeter un regard, vous remarquez des marques de larmes sur son visage candide.{/n} « Merci, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! {mf|Loué|Louée} soyez-vous ! Je n'oublierai jamais votre bonté ! » {n}dit-elle en s'inclinant profondément avant de disparaître dans les ténèbres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Den Wachen fehlt der Mut, deiner Forderung zu widersprechen, und sie treten zögernd zur Seite. Als die Frau sich noch einmal zu dir umdreht, siehst du Tränen auf ihrem arglosen Gesicht.{/n} "Danke, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}! Ihr habt ein gutes Herz! Ich werde Eure Güte niemals vergessen!" {n}Sie verbeugt sich tief und verschwindet in der Dunkelheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lacking the courage to object to your demand, the guards reluctantly step aside. As the woman turns to look back at you, you see wet trails on her guileless face.{/n} "Thank you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! You sweetheart! I'll never forget your kindness!" {n}She bows low and vanishes into the darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Den Wachen fehlt der Mut, deiner Forderung zu widersprechen, und sie treten zögernd zur Seite. Als die Frau sich noch einmal zu dir umdreht, siehst du Tränen auf ihrem arglosen Gesicht.{/n} "Danke, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}! Ihr habt ein gutes Herz! Ich werde Eure Güte niemals vergessen!" {n}Sie verbeugt sich tief und verschwindet in der Dunkelheit.{/n}
